org.openlcb.implementations

Class FakeMemoryConfigurationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openlcb.implementations.MemoryConfigurationService
      • org.openlcb.implementations.FakeMemoryConfigurationService

  • public class FakeMemoryConfigurationService
extends MemoryConfigurationService
    Created by bracz on 11/9/16. Test class for users of the MemoryConfigurationService. This is not in the test JAR so that clients of the OpenLCB library can also test without the network.
